SEARCH
Package utils

Class SoundImporter

java.lang.Object
utils.SoundImporter
public class SoundImporter extends Object
Util class responsible for importing audio tracks from the media's package by their name.
Version:
1.0.0

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private static AudioInputStream
    getAudio(String name)
    Returns the AudioInputStream of a given track name, fetched from the media's package.
    private static Clip
    getClip(AudioInputStream stream)
    Returns the Clip of a given track AudioInputStream, obtained using getAudio(java.lang.String) with a given name.
    static Clip
    loadTrack(String name)
    Returns the Clip of a given track by its relative name inside the media's package.

  • Method Details

    • loadTrack

      public static Clip loadTrack(String name)
      Returns the Clip of a given track by its relative name inside the media's package.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the track to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The Clip of the requested track.

    • getAudio

      private static AudioInputStream getAudio(String name)
      Returns the AudioInputStream of a given track name, fetched from the media's package.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the track to be loaded.
      Returns:
      AudioInputStream if the track was found, null otherwise.

    • getClip

      private static Clip getClip(AudioInputStream stream)
      Returns the Clip of a given track AudioInputStream, obtained using getAudio(java.lang.String) with a given name.
      Parameters:
      stream - The AudioInputStream of the track.
      Returns:
      The Clip relative to the AudioInputStream
